title: bloombits error chain reorged
body:
Running on Ropsten testnet

#### System information

Geth version: `v1.8.20-unstable-01371469`
OS & Version: Linux Ubuntu 16.04.5 LTS (GNU/Linux 4.4.0-138-generic x86_64)
Commit hash : v1.8.20-unstable-01371469/linux-amd64/go1.11.2


#### Expected behaviour
No error message

#### Actual behaviour
INFO [11-29|10:51:49.781] Upgrading chain index                    type=bloombits percentage=97
ERROR[11-29|10:51:49.783] Section processing failed                type=bloombits error="chain reorged during section processing"
INFO [11-29|10:52:00.761] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1  txs=33  mgas=3.156  elapsed=66.067ms  mgasps=47.771  number=4528200 hash=b046db…4f863f cache=23.27mB

INFO [11-29|10:53:32.597] Upgrading chain index                    type=bloombits percentage=97
ERROR[11-29|10:53:32.598] Section processing failed                type=bloombits error="chain reorged during section processing"


#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour


#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````
This error seems to have been resolved somehow.
